management_guidance: Best performing category. High foot traffic from students + tourists. Strong weekends. Priority target.
Major transit nodes with office + retail mix. High weekday volume. Pipeline: 211 Schermerhorn, 128 W 32nd.
Strong weekday performance but 40-60% weekend drop. Avoid opening two stores in same FiDi area.
Mixed-use neighborhoods provide balanced traffic. Moderate but sustainable.
Strong weekend tourist traffic. Chinatown/ethnic areas have Asian brand affinity advantage.
Theater district has seasonal/show-dependent traffic. Good evenings but morning-weak.
WORST PERFORMING category. Despite 8 subway lines, residential areas cannot generate volume. Avoid.
Pure residential locations project below breakeven. 29th & 3rd and 23rd & 1st expected to lose money.
